Description:

Dangerous and unpredictable situation - a proprietary feature of all games 
in the series Lost Planet, but now the player waiting for the most severe test! 
Lost Planet 3, dedicated to the history of colonization E.D.N. III, reveals new 
secrets sinister planet.

Lost Planet Hero 3 - pilot Jim Peyton, who took a risky but profitable business 
proposition of "Neo Venus Constructions" (NEVEK). Taking off from the Earth 
to the planet E.D.N. III, which the company prepares to colonization, Jim joins 
fellow trailblazers based Koronis. There he begins investigating the site and 
collecting samples of thermal energy component of the energy supply of the planet.

Since the thermal energy reserves NEVEK coming to an end, the fate of the mission 
on Koronis depends on its ability to extract energy from any natural source found. 
Jim understands that this is a great chance to get a huge reward and go home 
prematurely. The pilot decided to challenge the insidious planet and aggressive 
local race of locusts.

Jim machine - a "home away from home area." It stores a set of tools, essential 
field. Without a car, Jim would have lost not only work, but also life - housing 
protects the pilot from the vagaries of climate.

Lost Planet 3 combines different styles of play, including hiking battles and 
intense fighting in the first person. The game has several modes of multiplayer 
games and mesmerizing story for one player. Lost Planet 3 will allow you to 
dive deeper into the world of Lost Planet, and uncover the secrets of E.D.N. 
III. Uniquely dynamic environment.

Features:

A new journey in the universe of the famous Lost Planet - on icy planet EDN III, 
became a giant battlefield for survival, the planet more dangerous, volatile and 
unpredictable than before.

In this story, you play the role of a superhero is not, as usual wage worker who 
risked engage in combat with hostile alien nature, and its aim is not to save the 
world, but simply to earn good money and return to his family.

You have to learn to defend themselves from the terrible locusts and survive in 
the harshest ice storms mainly through varying economic futuristic construction 
equipment and tools, although the weapon you will be too.

Battles with the use of technology - from the first-person shooting, during which 
the hero moves on foot - with a third person.The game is created on the Unreal 
Engine 3, which means that you will find a spectacular visuals and exciting and 
dynamic gameplay - believe me, will not have time to relax.

Since the release of the first two parts of the series locusts become much more 
meaner and smarter, so fight against them will not be easy - in each battle will 
have to use different tactics.
